name: Inner Fire
summary: You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand.
description:
You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand. You can cast the produce flame cantrip as an innate primal or arcane spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.Traits

Ifrit: Ifrits are planar scions descended from efreet.
